original_title: Showers expected in most parts of the island this afternoon: Met. Dept.
original_body_lines: Showers or thundershowers are expected in most parts of the island during the afternoon or night, the Meteorology  Department said.
The Department said fairly heavy showers of about 75mm are likely at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central and Uva provinces and the Galle and Matara districts.
The general public is requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
